instruction: Describe three advantages of living in the digital age.
output: The digital age brings many advantages, including increased access to information, increased convenience, and increased connectivity. With access to the internet, people can quickly and easily access a wealth of information that otherwise would have been difficult to obtain. Digital technology offers increased convenience, with many activities such as shopping and banking able to be done quickly and easily from the comfort of home. Finally, the digital age allows for increased connectivity, with people now able to keep in touch more easily with family, friends, and colleagues from around the world.
